Previously there had been 1 incident of O-ring failure when temperature was 70\degree\text{F} and 3 incidents whenthe temperature was 54\degree\text{F}. Use linear extrapolation to estimate the number of incidents of O-ring failure you would expect when the temperature is 30\degree\text{F}.
